unnormalised: Nove upcharachea vikalp dironk lagleat, tem kronik pachanchea trasamni pidit aslolea rogiank ashachi kiran dita, oxem AIIMS Delhi hanga doctor Patel hannim aiz ugddapem kelem. IBS sarkhea sthitink niyontron korpak nove probiottiks ani aharant bodol korpachea probhavacher expertt lok sodtat. Lancetant chaplollea eka novea odheonant Crohn's diseaseakhatir eka novea vokhdanche ut'tejanacho porinnam disun ailo, jenem 75% rogiantli loxnon kamik keli.
normalised: Kalljeechya piddentlean tras bhogpi rogyank nove upcharanchi sandhi mellun, tankam asa mellta, oxem A-I-I-M-S Delhi hanga aiz doctor Patelan uktailem. I-B-S sarkhea sthitinchim vevasthapan korpak nove probiotics ani khayechea bodlanchi upyogita sodtat. The Lancet-ant chapill'lea eka navea abhyasant Crohn's piddenk navea vokhdachea ut'tejak parinnam dislet, zantunt panchhat'tor tok'ke rogyanchea lakshnamni unnai zali.

unnormalised: "Khub tempachea velar, gastroenterology mhunntlear loxnon sambhallpak sodtlear kainch naslem. Atam, ami vikalp polleun ravat je mul karonnacher nixed korunk xoktat," doctor Sharma, Fortis Hospital Mumbai hangasorle ek mukhel gastroenterologist, hannim patrakarank sanglem. Tannem fuddem mhonnlem ki khub rogiank ajwain sarkhea paramparik upai ani adhunik upcharanchea ektraponnan aram melltta.
normalised: "Khoob kall poryant, gastroenterology mhunntlear lakshnam vevasthapan korop aslem. Atam, amkam mool karnacher toklani upcharanche vikalp distat," oxem Fortis Hospital Mumbai-che mukhel gastroenterologist doctor Sharman patrakarank sanglem. Tannem fuddem sangolem ki zaite rogi ajwain sarkhea paramparik upayam ani adhunik upcharanchea sangatak aaram sodtat.

unnormalised: Pachonachea dukhnanchem pramaan vaddot ravlyant hea vishoyant doctoramni chinta dakhoilea. Aharacheo sovo, stress-chem promaan ani poristhitheent bodol hea sarkhea gosthink lagun hem pramaan vaddot asa, mhonn mandtat. Indian Council of Medical Research (ICMR) hannim kelea eka ahwalapromann, sumar 20% Bharatiy lok konnacheantori eka prakarchea gastrointestinal trasamni pidit asat.
normalised: Pachanchea duensanchi vaddti sankhya dekhun arogya udheogachea lokanim chinta uktavlea. Khoop karannam udexim hea duent vadd zata. Khayecheo sovoio, tanavachi patlli ani paryavarannache bodol hea sarkhea goztimni vadd zata. Indian Council of Medical Research (I-C-M-R) hachea eka navea ahwalanusar lagbhag visar tok'ke bharti lok kitem tori pachanchea rogachem duent bhogtat.

unnormalised: Healthcare providaramni roga zatkoch sambhallpak lagchekhatir cheshta korpak lagleat, tem niamit torancher check-up korunk ut'tejit kortat ani bore jivit jeevpachem mahatv sangtat. Colonoscopies atam 45 vorsanchea voir aslolea lokank colorectal cancer sodpak recommend kortat. "Zalear roog laginuch zann zalear borem," doctor Khan, Apollo Hospitals Chennai hangasorle ek senior consultant, hannim mahatv dillem. "Ami trastank gambhir zaunche adim dhorunk sodtat."
normalised: Arogya seva purovnar rokhtanchi niyamit chek-up korun ani bore jivitachyo nivo dharunk ut'tejan dinvchek dhyan ditat. Atam chell'lisa vorosanchea voir aslolea vyaktink colorectal cancer sodunk colonoscopies suchoytat. "Vegim sodun kaddop khup mhotvachem," Apollo Hospitals Chennai-che senior consultant doctor Khanan mhonnlle. "Duens gombhir zaunchea adim amkam tanche vor sodun kaddpak zai."

unnormalised: Gastroenterological upcharank lagpi kharch khub ghorkank ek vhodd tras zaunk xakta. Ayushman Bharat sarkhea sarkari udyamank lagun healthchekhatir mellpi sovlotecher dhyan dita. Rogi hepatitis ani cirrhosis sarkhea sthitinkhatir empanelled hospitalant upchar ghetunk xoktat, jem Rs. 5 lakh poriant cover kortat.
normalised: Gastroenterological upcharank lagpi khorch zaitea kutumbank ek motti trasanchi vostu zaunk xokta. Ayushman Bharat sarkhea sorkari prayatnak lagun arogya seva odik sulabh ani porvadd zatoli. Rogi hepatitis ani cirrhosis sarkhea sthitink panelacher asli hoxpitallanim upchar gheunk xoktat ani panch lakh rupiantlem bharan tankam mellta.

unnormalised: Technological bodlachem gastroenterologyachea fieldant khub mahatv asa. Endoscopic ultrasound (EUS) sarkhea kamich dukhi korpi proseduram atam sadharan zait voitat, jenem doctorank dukhnank barikain sondun upchar korpak melltta. "Hi technology pachonachea dukhnachea prakaran bodol ghodoun haddtta," doctor Verma, Max Healthcare Delhi hangasorle endoscopic prosedurache specialist, hannim mhonnlem. "Tem kam dukhi korta, kam vel dita borem zaunk, ani rogiank boro porinnam melltta."
normalised: Tantrik unnetimni gastroenterologychea udheogant mhotvachi bhumika kel'li asa. Endoscopic ultrasound (E-U-S) sarkhea nakhuchik prakriya odik samanya zata, tankam lagun doktork odik chokxai korpak ani sthitionk thik korpak mellta. "Heo tantrik pod'dotimni amchea pachanchea duensank vegllea ritin vevasthapan korpachea ritint kranti keli asa," Max Healthcare Delhi-che endoscopic prakriyancher visheshagnya doctor Verman mhonnllem. "Teo odik trasdayok naxil'leo, tanka veglle kaddpak thoddo vel lagta ani te rogyank bore parinnam divpak puro."

unnormalised: Expertamni konnakoddleanui pachonachem dukh zalear ek boro gastroenterologistacho ray gheunk mahatv dila. Anapekchit vokhdam ghetlean ani purai mhaiti nastana viswas thevun problem zaunk xokta. Tumchea pottak sambhallop khub imp. asa, bhai! Mhunn, tumank problem dista zalear, tumchea doctorak sampork kor. Med storeantlean pil ghetakai naka! Expert lok mhontat tem mhonnlear pott dukhop, pott fugop, vo pottran bodol zatat tem visar naka marunk. Tankam lokank zannvikai diunk ani potachi kallji gheunk zai asa.
normalised: Konnakuy pachan vishayak duens asa zalear ek patr gastroenterologisticho sallo gheuncheachem mhotvachem mhunn vishexgyani bhaar dilo. Swotavean vokham gheun ani purai khoborina te khobrer visar thevun tras zaunk xokta. Tujem pot bhagitoch samballpachi khup goroz asa, bhai! Dekhun, tumaka kashtta astat zalear tumchea doctork bhett di. Fokot med store-antli vokham gheun naka! Durtiche dukhi, fuggop, ya bhaganim bodol sarkhea lakshmank dolak dharl'lim zannam mhunn vishexgyani suchoilem. Tankam loka bodal jagaar zaunchek ani potanchi dekhrekh gheunchek asa.
